test.query: SELECT RegionID, AVG(LENGTH(Title)), AVG(LENGTH(URL)), COUNT(DISTINCT RegionID) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE RegionID >= 4 AND RegionID <= 259 GROUP BY RegionID
SELECT RegionID, AVG(LENGTH(Title)), AVG(LENGTH(URL)), AVG(RegionID) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE RegionID >= 5 AND RegionID <= 605 GROUP BY RegionID

SELECT EventDate, RegionID, AVG(LENGTH(Title)), MIN(EventDate), AVG(RegionID) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE RegionID >= 4 AND RegionID <= 255 AND EventDate BETWEEN toDate('2013-06-01') AND toDate('2013-08-30') GROUP BY EventDate, RegionID
SELECT EventDate, AVG(LENGTH(Title)) FROM hits_10m_single WHERE EventDate BETWEEN toDate('2013-06-01') AND toDate('2013-08-30') GROUP BY EventDate
